idea:
Dear Sir,                                           

     We are your regular suppliers of STAINLESS STEEL RAW MATERIALS IN THE FORM OF : Pipes, Tubes, Rods, Bars, Plates, Sheets, Squares, Circles, Wires, Coil etc .Fitting items like : Flanges of all types, Elbows, Bends, Reducers, Tees, Couplings, Nuts and Bolts etc with regular acceptance from your side. 

Till recently we have not heard any enquiries from you. 


So kindly restart all the regular enquiries as usual to us to enable us move forward in business for mutual benefits in nation building. 

sYour Faithfully & Regards,
name: MOKSH METAL AND ALLOYS

idea:
Devbrath Guha is a corporate trainer for fitness and a passionate wellness coach who believes that there is so much more to pursuing overall health than just being physically fit. He believes that wellness coaches are the future of health education.  His belief that a research-based guidance on wellness can actually help to change a person’s behavior and result in more positive outcomes of goals coupled with his persuasive nature of conducting workshops ensures a convinced and satisfied audience at the end of every session. 
 
Being a successful corporate banker now for over 2 decades with experience across 3 MNC banks in senior management positions, Devbrath clearly understands the needs of today’s corporate culture that expects nurturing a healthy working environment that is resilient to challenges with a clarity of purpose amongst employees who are committed to excellence. And it all starts from their wellbeing. Imagine being able to consult with one person who can cater to the physical, mental, and emotional well-being of your employees! 
 
With over 5 years’ experience in research based nutritional and fitness science, Devbrath has walked the talk by transforming himself over the years and helping over 500 clients to lead a happy and successful life. He is a Precision Nutrition certified Exercise Nutrition coach, ACSM certified Weight Management- Sports- Keto Nutritionist, NESTA approved Sports Nutrition and Diet Specialist, K11 and Pearson Assured certified Personal Trainer and an IATD certified NLP Master Practitioner. A well-presented, self-motivated and confident wellness coach with the ability to communicate complex and sensitive information about dietary matters in an understandable form to audience, helping to change behaviors resulting in more positive outcomes of goals. He also specializes in conducting sessions on stress management, managing lifestyle diseases and better work-life balance. 
 
Devbrath has already conducted customized sessions on health and nutrition for large corporates like National Textile Corporation Ltd (a government undertaking), The Hongkong and Shanghai Bank, Samsung India as well as charitable organizations like SSRVM School, Churches and Lions club in addition to conducting a public workshop. His other seminars have been attended by employees from SBI, ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, Carrier air-conditioning and successful entrepreneurs. 
 
Devbrath is excellent in demonstrations during his sessions thereby leaving a lasting mark on the minds of his audience. His zeal and energy during his training sessions emanate from his passion about transforming people’s approach towards wellness and health. His trademark is “If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.”
name: Bodism- A Religion of Wellness

idea: Planning to curate stories based on gender, hobbies, age, time etc.
name: SL KRIATION LLP

idea:
Our story started in 2011, hinging strongly on the fact that the world was changing too rapidly for the students to just rely on classroom education. In order to develop students to be battle ready for the life after college, a sustained mechanism was needed which would educate them beyond books. The need of the hour was experiential learning. Thus was born Industrialvisits.in

We have a firm belief on the positive imprint, that EDUCATION TOURISM will make on the aptitude and attitude of a student. To complement the conventional way of theoretical learning, we introduced the concept of learning through first hand experience in the relevant field and by being on the field.

Our industry programs interaction with executives from corporate world are planned in synchronization with the theoretical curriculum. The “IV LEARNING WORKSHEET” is prepared by highly experienced educators with the goal of igniting the passion in the student and give basic working knowledge in his/her field.

The central idea of our story is to help students make a successful story for themselves. We are here to expedite your success!
name: Industrialvisits

idea:
In our journey of over 10+ years, we have catalyzed some of the major changes that have led to India's emergence as the global destination for software services talent. We pioneered the Global Delivery Model and became one of the Best IT Company from India. We have rich experience in managing complex SAP projects. Led by a pool of dedicated, dignified and experienced consultants, we render a range of SAP solution including SAP GRC, SAP Ariba, SAP Hybris C4C, SAP Success - Factors and OpenText Solutions. Presence in SAP S/4HANA Implementations, Support, Conversion & Cloud Services and OpenText makes iLosung a niche SAP service provider and stays distinctive.

iLosung is a privately held company, having corporate office in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India and started operations across all regions of EMEA, ANZ, UAE, USA and APAC.
name: ILOSUNG PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
“Technology is not complete until it is secured” with this core belief our company Krytech Web Security Solutions Pvt. Ltd. was conceptualized.This has inspired us to constantly evolve and improve to provide best in class service. Krytech has an exclusive blend of Management experts and Technology professionals, passionate & dedicated in developing secured web applications. We also serve to secure the existing web applications to maintain the security and integrity of our esteemed clients & services.Our core focus is to maintain the “Cyber Safety” in this Digital Age.With our “Unique framework” of Design, Develop, Secure & Update; we have developed a unique methodology to fix the loopholes in the web applications & services. It is a Turnkey solution to the client which supports them to achieve business goals. The systematic approach adopted during successful project execution has a satisfactory review from clients.


Our Goal


There is a notion in the minds of companies that Cyber Security is a costly affair, and can be afforded by big budget organizations only. 


Our goal is to provide service at affordable rates to all types of organizations and also develop & maintain a safe & secured framework for all our clients & services in this Digital Age to help them grow the business.


One Team, Many Talents


We have a talented team serving under one single roof, allowing us to cater each and every needs of our clients as we provide following services:-

Integrated Web Application Development & Design

Integrated Hybrid Application Development & Design

Web Application Enhancement & Security

Digital Marketing & Branding

Security Testing of Applications in Development
name: KRYTECH WEB SECURITY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Go Warranty is an independent provider of after sales service for digital products and home appliances. Their flagship product is Go Extended Warranty. They claim that their Extended Warranty program ensures that Customers are able to maintain their electronic products in top condition even in years 2, 3 & 4 of the life of the product – long after the manufacturer’s warranty has expired.To put it simply, they charge Customers a small fee at the time of purchase of their new product, say a TV. The TV is covered by the manufacturer’s warranty in the First Year. However, in Second Year there is no warranty by the manufacturer. If something goes wrong with the TV, the Customer will have to do 2 things viz. they will have to take the pains to figure out the closest Service Center to log a call with them and also have to pay for the repairs and service charges associated with the malfunctioning TV. However, because the Customer had purchased the Go Warranty Service Plan at the time of purchase of TV, all the customer has to do is to call them. Not only do they visit the Customer at their home, but also pay all the charges that are incurred to repair the TV.Customers can buy the Go Warranty’s Extended Warranty plans from their website, www.GoWarranty.in or from any of their preferred partners like amazon.in. Apart from Extended Warranty, Go Warranty also have a couple of plans for mobile phones, tablets and laptops. Manufacturer’s warranty covers all routine problems occurring in the phone for the first 12 months of ownership of the phone. It does not cover any physical or liquid damage to the phone.
name: GO WARRANTY & SERVICES LLP
